plea.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a request that is urgent or full of emotion

plea.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a statement by someone in a court of law saying whether they are guilty or not
plea.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Adams entered a plea of ‘not guilty’.
